rComments: Prof. Laniyonu was very fair and I learned so much in his course. I would recommend it to anyone in the Crim program and was pleasantly surprised by how fair him/his TA Maya graded everything. It's important to do the readings to get full marks on the exams.
teacherRatingTags: ['Test heavy', 'Get ready to read', 'Clear grading criteria']

rComments: very interesting lectures, and the tests are very manageable and have no surprises. I would definitely say that the lectures are more important comparing to the readings .

Prof Laniyonu is really awesome. One of the most interesting courses I've ever taken; it's about the politics of the American justice system. Assignments weren't too bad, tests were VERY fair. If you pay attention and do the readings, you'll do great. Only downside is he talks super quietly, so sit at the front or you won't be able to hear him!
teacherRatingTags: ['Accessible outside class', 'Gives good feedback', 'Clear grading criteria']
